name: TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to survey setout
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site concrete at correct level, and surfacewithin accepted tolerances (+/- 10mm).
TEST REQUIRED - Surveyor to set out PCS slab including duct recesses and bolt positions
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to steel reinforcing and formwork construction
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundations shall be set out as per IFC drawings.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Ruakaka BESS-Concrete Pads Project Specification 6-P0304.03
TEST REQUIRED - Mix Design to be approved by Meridian prior to use
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to use on site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Mix Deisgn as per specification (30MPa, 19mm) and approved by Meridian.
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Ruakaka BESS-Concrete Pads Project Specification 6-P0304.03
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Steel reinforcing comlies to specifications/IFC drawings/
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Dimensional check completed and within tolerances. Formwork installed inspected as being suitable for pouring concrete.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Steel installed as per IFC drawings. Grade of steel as specified. Number, size and spacing of bars as per IFC drawings.
TEST REQUIRED - Visual Inspection, Continuity Test
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Earth bars and cables installed as per IFC drawings. Continuity test completed and passed by MEL.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Following placement of concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Post pour inspection sheet to be completed following each PCS slab pour
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - On completion of Separable Portions
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As-built drawings submitted to MEL.
